message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $200. I believe it's a fantastic deal, let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $120 is a bit too low for me, I could be convinced to go down to $180. What do you think?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $180 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $160?
